  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x96
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x96
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x80
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 100x80
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 86x79
          text run at (0,0) width 79: "Lorem ipsum"
          text run at (0,20) width 86: "dolor sit amet,"
          text run at (0,40) width 69: "consectetur"
          text run at (0,60) width 84: "adipiscing elit."
